conversation_history.content:
Nice to meet you! I'm the AI Hiring Assistant from TalentScout. I'm excited to learn more about you and see if we can find a great fit for you.

To get started, could you please share your full name with me? This will help me address you properly and keep our conversation organized.

Hi John, nice to chat with you today! Thanks for introducing yourself. I'd love to learn more about you and see if there's a great fit for you at our company.

To help me get started, could you please share your email address and phone number with me? This will allow me to reach out to you with any updates or next steps in the hiring process.

Also, feel free to share them in any format you're comfortable with - for example, you can type out your email address or share it as a dot-com address. And for your phone number, you can share it with area code or without - whatever works best for you!
